A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This Movie was nothing more than a pile of steaming shit.
Seriously\, this is just garbage!
What was the story arc with this asian chick about? I would have liked to know more about Finn's character and how he could save the republic but no I had to go on with this chick I don't care about\, onto a planet to do what?? euh... nobody knows\, but hey... we've got to see some cool aliens and she saved the animals! yeah that's fun right? ....no! that's not right\, that's plain  shit!

Then there is the thing with Poe and the purple hair old sack\, I don't remember her name because she's on screen for like 30 minutes and Boom \, she goes suicide bombing on Snoke's ship. ( by the way\, if that was that easy\, why didn't they try it sooner with a smaller ship btw?)
Then Poe serves no purpose\, why? cause he does stupid shit and is always worng whatever he does.

Oh\, and yeah admiral Akbar is here too! but he dies like a bitch \, while Leia gets to go full Iron man in space. That must be really cool to have skywalker blood\, it gives you the power of Ex Machina.

Then Snoke dies for no reason at all\, we don't know who he was....  over.

Ah yes.. I almost forgot\, Rey's parents are just alcoholics\, who sold her to drink more...   ok so she's just the most powerful jedi in the galaxy without any background to it.... That's complete bullshit.

And Luke dies like a shitty homeless dude\, yeah because he's a homeless old guy who can't  fight...

This is the end of Star Wars... This film sgaa is supposed to be the Legacy of The skywalkers... what is left? a Mary Sue related to no one who can one shot everything... and yeah she's gonna win against Kylo Ren\, do you have any doubt about it?

Star Wars is dead today\, I will pretend this saga never existed \, And Luke will remain the great Jedi Master he was meant to be.

F##ck you Ryan Johnson! and F##ck you Kathlyn kennedy for Ruining star wars!
